about: Experienced web developer with over 7 years of expertise in building responsive, user-friendly websites and applications. Specialized in JavaScript frameworks and modern CSS techniques. Passionate about creating efficient, scalable solutions and mentoring junior developers.

experience.description: Lead a team of 5 developers to build and maintain the company's flagship web application.
details: Implemented performance optimizations that reduced load times by 40%
Introduced React best practices and TypeScript to the codebase
Mentored junior developers and conducted design workshops

experience.description: Developed and maintained client websites using modern JavaScript frameworks.
details: Reduced client site bounce rates by 25% through performance improvements
Collaborated with designers to implement responsive layouts

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
